title: Need Help Designing an Art Catalog, 11x17, single image + annotation
content:
I attached an example, posters are going to be as long as the one on the right at the most. I wasn’t sure if I should align them all on the bottom and rag on top or otherwise. This will be a twin-loop / double-wire binding so the pages will be spread apart ~1/6th” when opened opposed to a perfect bind which would obscure the middle.

Questions  
How do I decide where to place the image, the text (inc. colophon)  
Some thoughts about text hierarchy  
Maintaining some sort of order between posters that vary in size (width kept the same)

The book is 11x17, bound as demonstrated by the spread

Thanks!
